channel.title: [PI] Thieving
channel.description:
Hello everyone, How I set it up so far is. You need a ticket to thieve a stall, you but tickets from shop. When You have tickets in you're inventory and click a stall, it takes away one ticket and you theive one time. I want to make it soo, you can only buy i certain amount of tickets per day. I don't know how to go about this though, I think it has something to do with this,
case 239: c.getShops().openShop(78); break;

item.title: [PI] Thieving
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

Hello everyone,
How I set it up so far is. You need a ticket to thieve a stall, you but tickets from shop.
When You have tickets in you’re inventory and click a stall, it takes away one ticket and you theive one time.
I want to make it soo, you can only buy i certain amount of tickets per day.
I don’t know how to go about this though, I think it has something to do with this,

case 239: c.getShops().openShop(78); break;

Read full topic
